title: Careers in building
creator_credit: Bruce McNaughton, Ronald Mason and Academy Film Productions
brief_description: A vocational guidance film on the building industry. Shows the erection of a tall city office block; the men and women of the building industry at work in their diverse activities; the craftsmanship and skill required to erect a typical Australian brick veneer home; the development of a new airline terminal; and the construction work involved in a guided missile rocket pad.
